feed.title: glazeruns TikTok
feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from glazeruns

entry.title: It was such a fun month watching firefighters from all over the world running fire station loops. I hope you challenged yourself and possibly found that running is fun and a great way to destress. Please let me know how many miles you ran. Don't worry if
entry.content: It was such a fun month watching firefighters from all over the world running fire station loops. I hope you challenged yourself and possibly found that running is fun and a great way to destress. Please let me know how many miles you ran. Don't worry if

entry.title: Thanks for all the support over the past 4 years. Over 30,000 miles run. So many highs and lows. But all good things must come to an end. Happy April Fools Day. #runtok #runstreak #ultrarunner
entry.content: Thanks for all the support over the past 4 years. Over 30,000 miles run. So many highs and lows. But all good things must come to an end. Happy April Fools Day. #runtok #runstreak #ultrarunner

entry.title: Low mileage month, but I'm happy with everything I accomplished. My racing season is getting ready to start, and I'll have plenty of opportunities to make up some miles. Besides working a ton, I raised money for @llsusa and flew to Seattle for the @firefi
entry.content: Low mileage month, but I'm happy with everything I accomplished. My racing season is getting ready to start, and I'll have plenty of opportunities to make up some miles. Besides working a ton, I raised money for @llsusa and flew to Seattle for the @firefi

entry.title: I am a city boy and have no idea what to do. . #runtok #cowtok
entry.content: I am a city boy and have no idea what to do. . #runtok #cowtok

entry.title: Eclipse glasses or it didn't happen. Moab 240 was wild last year with a full eclipse during the race. smile, or you're doing it wrong #runtok #eclipse
entry.content: Eclipse glasses or it didn't happen. Moab 240 was wild last year with a full eclipse during the race. smile, or you're doing it wrong #runtok #eclipse

entry.title: Seems like a lot of middle school personalities in the comments this week. Whatever will I do with all this hate? Remember, if you put yourself out there on the internet, the troll will come for you. They will try to rip you down to make themselves feel b

entry.title: Being prepared is part of getting through the rough points without quitting. We will call this part one, because there's more I carry. Maybe it's the paramedic in me, but I'm always seeing worst-case scenarios, and often, there is a small lightweight solu

entry.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
entry.content: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
